polyenco.title: Polyenco's website
polyenco.content: Presentation website for the junior industry Polyenco from my engineering school Polytech, design and developed entirely by me

jsExecutor.title: JS Executor
jsExecutor.content: A web application that lets users collaborate on a javacsript file and execute the code remotely. Made for one of my courses at UQAC

simpleChat.title: Simple Chat
simpleChat.content: A simple chat app that I made to learn how to use socket.io, featuring multiple chat rooms and a dark themed facebook-like design

scrumBattle.title: Scrum Battle
scrumBattle.content:
A web application based on the Kanban principles, allowing the users to create and move tasks on a board. When a card is moved, animations show the user the new advancement of the project.
Made within a team of 4 in 48 hours, and winner of the 2018 CGI's code jam. The theme : 'Implement the principles of gamification into a project team'.
